promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive mythical dragonfly psychic-type pokemon with purple cosmic wings. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or dragonfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cosmoptera, a a massive mythical dragonfly psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Strafe-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragonfly", "psychic" or "Cosmoptera". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, dragonfly-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, galaxy background
generatedDescription: This mystic insectoid dwells in caverns, using its Strafe-GX ability to navigate. Its vast wings flutter in patterns that emulate constellations.
